title: Looking for Plat + Players to join ranked team
body:
Hi lads, 
I'm looking for players who main the following roles and are plat+ or like gold 2 at least.
- Top
-Jungle
- Mid
- Support

*Summoner Name:

*Primary role: 

Secondary Role:

Comment on this thread or add me in game.
